Header.title: We are Omisej
Header.paragraph: We are an engineering company dedicated to industry-leading service and customer satisfaction providing Water Treatment and Engineering services in Nigeria.

About.paragraph: OMISEJ NIGERIA LIMITED is a Nigerian indigenous company duly incorporated on 10th January, 1994 under the Nigerian Company and Allied Matters Law of 1976 as a Private Limited Liability Company. We are a Water, Mechanical and Chemical Engineering company. We are staffed with well-trained Engineers with extensive experience in Steel fabrication and erection, water treatment, borehole drilling and servicing. Ourservices are prompt, efficient and customer oriented with zero tolerance to incidence.
Why: Peace of mind for our customers

Features.title: Our Mission
Features.text: To provide quality service and products rooted in customer satisfaction with constant innovations and improvements.

Features.title: Our Vision
Features.text: To be an engineering company that will be capable of handling projects(service and produce) for government, oil industry, manufacturing industry, multi-national companies and individuals in Nigeria, Africa and the world.

Features.title: Nigeria Society of Engineers
Features.text: Omisej Nigeria Limited is a member of the Nigerian Society of Engineers

Features.title: NIWASA member
Features.text: We also belong to the Nigeria Water & Sanitation Association
